title: end of the season border
body: i got a 2 week ban a long time ago but i can't get to lvl 1 honor for some reason and we are at the end of the season will i still get my rank border?

replies.body: It looks like you got a suspension on October, which means you don't qualify for the Season Rewards this year. I know it can  be frustrating to lose your rewards, but remember there is next season. Stay positive, be helpful, but most of all try to have fun and not let negative players bring you down.
oh okey but can u check my logs if i have proven myself cus this took forever to get honor 1 and maybe only give me the silver border as reward :)?
